publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5160.2 Iain Smith: Scotland’s Historic Environment - A Unique Resource for Our Economy and Our People—As an amendment to motion (S3M-5160) in the name of Michael Russell, insert at end "; looks forward to hearing a comprehensive account of the discussions that took place at the summit, and encourages the Scottish Government to work constructively with Historic Scotland and the National Trust for Scotland and to develop relationships with the non-governmental sector to ensure the sustainability of Scotland’s built environment and to maintain and improve public access to it." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
